scripts.deploy-local: npx graph deploy manifold/uniswap-ext --debug --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.deploy: npx graph deploy manifold/uniswapv-ext --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --debug
scripts.watch-local: npx graph deploy graphprotocol/Uniswap2 --watch --debug --node http://127.0.0.1:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001
